Method Detail

isApplicable

public abstract boolean isApplicable(java.lang.Class<? extends Job> jobType)
Returns true if this JobProperty type is applicable to the given job type.

Normally, this method is implemented like return AbstractProject.class.isAssignableFrom(jobType) where "AbstractProject" is the J of JobProperty<J>.

Returns:
true to indicate applicable, in which case the property will be displayed in the configuration screen of this job.

getPropertyDescriptors

public static java.util.List<JobPropertyDescriptor> getPropertyDescriptors(java.lang.Class<? extends Job> clazz)
Gets the JobPropertyDescriptors applicable for a given job type.
